Package com.group02.guard

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncGetConnectivityData.AsyncResponse  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncChangeTravellerData
    Runs in the background thread for the purpose of adding/deleting a Traveller as well as updating the Travellers password to and from the Database
    AsyncGetConnectivityData
    Runs in the background thread for the purpose of getting connection info
    AsyncGetTravellerData
    Runs in the background thread for the purpose of getting Traveller data
    AsyncReachInternet
    Checks if internet connection available
    BatteryActivity
    The class creates an activity that displays detailed battery data
    BluetoothThread
    A thread that connects to a remote device over Bluetooth, and reads/writes data using message Handlers.
    BluetoothThreadTest
    Created by jeberlen on 2017-03-06.
    ClientReceiveThread
    A thread that allows receiving the car location in the background.
    ClientSendThread
    A thread that allows sending the location in the background, once the location is changed.
    Control
    The Control class is a circular controller for an Arduino Smartcar.
    ControllerActivity
    An activity that includes the video stream, the controller, the batteryImageButton levels of the car.
    ControlTest
    Created by jeberlen on 2017-03-23.
    DbHelper
    Creates and houses java object responsible for managing connection to DB
    HashInformation
    The class generates a hash string which will be used to encrypt user input
    LoginActivity
    The class creates an activity that handles database and session and allows the user to log in
    LoginSuite
    Created by jeberlen on 2017-03-30.
    MainActivity
    Creates the "MainScreen" of the G.U.A.R.D.
    MapsActivity
    Implements the google API and uses it to retreive current location of the phone
    NonMatchingPasswordRegisterTest  
    NonValidEmailRegisterTest  
    ProfileActivity
    Creates a Traveller Profile page
    RegisterActivity
    The class creates an activity that handles database and session and allows the user to register
    Sensor
    The logics for a sensor on the car, includes a map of all the colors, and the drawing of the actual sensor.
    Session
    The class creates a "session" held in shared preferences of the app.
    ShortPasswordRegisterTest  
    SmartCar
    Creates a SmartCar object representing SmartCar's connection data
    ToolbarBottomFragment
    Creates a bottom toolbar used for navigating withing different activities
    ToolbarTopFragment
    Creates a top toolbar with app title, option menu button and battery button
    Traveller
    Creates a Traveller object
    WifiActivity Deprecated
    from sprint 7 and onwards
    WifiBroadcastReceiver Deprecated
    from sprint 7 and onwards
